text: To copy beauty forfeits all pretense to fame to copy faults is want of sense.
author: Charles Churchill

text: Beauty, sweet love, is like the morning dew, Whose short refresh upon tender green, Cheers for a time, but till the sun doth show And straight is gone, as it had never been.
author: Samuel Daniel

text: What I loved about 'Summer' was that they were these four bright kids with a wonderful future. In a way, she was the one with the brains, and then you have the beauty queen and the jock and the introvert.
author: Kevin Williamson

text: Stories aren't the beauty of what did happen. They're the beauty of what could happen.
author: Brad Meltzer

text: I will admit to hoarding beauty products. I'm a beauty lady.
author: Naya Rivera
